title: Consumer preference : fiction versus non-fiction books in England 2013
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Share of respondents for 4 number of Responses.
The maximum Share of respondents 44.0 is found at Response Mixture of both and the minimum is found at Neither where Response is 8.0.
There is a difference of 36.0 between the maximum Response Mixture of both and minimum Response Neither.
min_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Share of respondents for 4 number of Responses.
The Share of respondents is appeared to be the highest at Response Mixture of both and lowest at Response Neither.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Share of respondents for 4 number of Responses.
The maximum Share of respondents 44.0 is found at Response Mixture of both and the minimum is found at Neither where Response is 8.0.
There is a difference of 36.0 between the maximum Response Mixture of both and minimum Response Neither.
max_summary: This bar chart has 4 columns on the x axis representing Response, and Share of respondents in each Response on the y axis.
The Share of respondents is appeared to be the highest at Response Mixture of both and lowest at Response Neither.
The highest Response Mixture of both has 36.0 more Share of respondents than the lowest Response Neither.
Share of respondents at Response Mixture of both is 44.0 , second place is Fiction at 26.0, and thirdly is Non-fiction at 22.0.
Considered together, the average Share of respondents in all 4 Responses is roughly 25.0.
The Share of respondents is 100.0 if we add up values of all Responses.
